alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 7:44AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW ACROSS RHODE ISLAND AND SOUTHEAST MASSACHUSETTS... At 739 AM EST, radar indicated a roughly 20 mile wide band of heavy snow along a line extending from Quincy to near Providence. This band has been producing snowfall at the rate of over 2 inches per hour along with very low visibilities. This band will be slowly drifting southeast through mid morning. Locations impacted include... Providence, New Bedford, Brockton, Quincy, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Plymouth, Taunton, Weymouth, East Providence, Braintree, Coventry, Dartmouth, Cumberland, Randolph, North Providence, South Kingstown and West Warwick. Due to the rapid accumulation of snow, hazardous driving conditions will occur. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this band of heavy snow.
